byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

byteLength.description: The length of the compressed data in bytes.

indicesCount.description: The number of indices of this primitive.

vertexCount.description: The number of vertex of this primitive.

geometryType.description: The type of the geometry, mesh or point cloud.

attributesOrder.description: The order of attributes in decompressed butter.
attributesOrder.gltf_detailedDescription: The decompressed mesh needs to be write to the memory for uploading to GPU, including indices and attributes data. `attributesOrder` is used to define the order of the attributes.

attributesComponentType.description: The component type of each attributes that are encoded in the compressed mesh.

items.description: The datatype of components in the attribute.

attributesComponentType.gltf_detailedDescription: This is a duplicated property of each attribute that is compressed in the primitive. Used for defining how to write decompressed mesh to buffer correctly.

attributesType.description: The component type of each attributes that are encoded in the compressed mesh.

items.description: Specifies if the attribute is a scalar, vector, or matrix.

attributesType.gltf_detailedDescription: This is a duplicated property of each attribute that is compressed in the primitive. Used for defining how to write decompressed mesh to buffer correctly.
